hero_subtitle: Transform your physique and embrace a healthier lifestyle with our comprehensive fitness and nutrition support.
info_text: The World Health Organization recommends at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic physical activity throughout the week for adults aged 18–64. However, what happens if we adjust that number to 110 minutes every day?
favorites_empty: It appears that you haven't added any exercises to your favorites yet. To get started, you can add exercises that you like to your favorites for easier access in the future.
footer_subscribe_text: Subscribe and learn about new exercises!
footer_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
settings_subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings_profile_photo_desc: Add a photo to personalize your account
modernEquipmentDesc: The latest equipment from leading global brands for effective workouts
professionalTrainersDesc: Certified specialists with years of experience and a personalized approach
flexibleScheduleDesc: We are open from 6:00 to 23:00 every day so you can train at a convenient time
personalTrainingDesc: Personalized programs tailored to your goals and abilities
personalTrainingDescFull: One-on-one sessions with experienced trainers who will design a program just for you. Personalized guidance, technique control, and motivation to achieve the best results.
reviewAlice: The best gym in town! Professional trainers, modern equipment, and a friendly atmosphere. I always feel motivated and reach my goals. Highly recommend!
reviewBob: I’ve been training here for over a year — the results are incredible. The trainers are always helpful, the classes are engaging, and the gym is clean and organized. I feel healthier and more energetic than ever!
reviewClara: Clean, organized, and top-notch equipment. The staff is friendly and always ready to help. I especially love the group classes — they keep me motivated!
reviewDavid: Flexible hours allow me to train even after work. The trainers are attentive and always give useful tips. Every workout feels rewarding!
reviewEva: The trainers truly care about everyone’s progress. I lost 10 kg in 3 months thanks to their personalized programs. The atmosphere is supportive and motivating. I feel stronger and more confident!
reviewFrank: The gym’s atmosphere pushes me to achieve more. The variety of equipment and classes makes every session enjoyable. I always leave full of energy!
noAccessDesc: If you want to have access to this site, simply register
title: Plan your Workouts
subtitle: Organize your weekly workout schedule and track your progress.
name: Name
persZan: Personal training with experienced trainers who will develop a program specifically for you. Individual approach, control of exercise technique and motivation to achieve the best results.
systemWelcome: Hi! I’m your fitness assistant. Ask me — you’ll get a plan or advice.

chatSubtitle: Quick tips, workout plans, and safe training guidance.
